comment.author: 9134056@N05
comment._content:
A  beautiful  photo.. 
The  Truck  is an  American  GMC  CCKW 2.5 ton  truck ... 
As the  Administrator  for  the group   GMC CCKW  and we  would  love to add this  photo  to  this  group .. 
There are  relatively  few  photos  of   GMC  CCKWs  in  this  theater  of  War,  compared  to the European,  and the  Pacific  Theaters .. during  WW 2 .. So  this  would be  a  very  good  addition ..
